TopicTitle: Impossible to use planes in KSP 1.2.2 with RSS + RP-0

Articles.Content:
Hi!

I would like to build planes with that config, but the wheels seems to be broken as long as the runway. If I try to steer, it's like the wheels of the plane doesn't have grip. If I manage to go straight, there are some bumps in the runway that break my planes or make them uncontrollable. Does anyone know a way to fix this?

Thanks!

Theres some wheel mod that it needs, forgot its name

 

Welcome to the fabulous place known as the forums!

I have the same problem and the only solution i can think of right now is to either get a new runway using the KK mod if you have the configs working, or make a seaplane or a VTOL.

I once tried this and it worked:
Haha, nice VTOL. It's sad then that the airplanes cannot be properly built. I hope they got fix soon, because I love to build them and RP0 have nice engines and all of that.
Modded support issue moved to the moded support subforum.
